RelatedSentence: France 's Publicis Groupe has won a digital marketing deal with Facebook worth about $ 500 million including spending , Ad Age reported Monday , citing an executive familiar with the matter .
France 's Publicis Groupe has won a digital marketing deal with Facebook worth about $ 500 million including spending , Ad Age reported Monday , citing an executive familiar with the matter .
The deal will be managed by all the group 's agencies in North America followed by a global roll out , Publicis-owned Starcom MediaVest Group 's spokeswoman Anita Mcgorty told Reuters .
